TextView.android:text:
5 - Easily wake up, no negative effects of sleep 

4 - Can wake up relatively easy, but may experience 
'tired eyes' or slight grogginess

3 - May take a moment to reorientate and get out of 
bed, but not difficult

2 - It is a little hard to get out of bed and you may lay 
back down/snooze your alarm

1 - It is very hard to get out of bed, you may snooze 
multiple times, fall back asleep, and grogginess lingers
